definitions: Illegally seize (an aircraft, ship, or vehicle) in transit and force it to go to a different destination or use it for one's own purposes.
Take control of (a computer system, website, or online account) without permission.
Take over or appropriate (something) for one's own use, especially in a way that is unauthorized or unfair.
examples: The plane was hijacked by terrorists.
His social media account was hijacked.
The protest was hijacked by a fringe group.
